name: sne1k
description:
- Collect apples for points
- Collect star to end level (extra points for remaining body segments)
- Colliding with any part of an enemy snake is game over
- CTRL-R to restart

Made for PICO1k 2022: https://itch.io/jam/pico-1k-2022

Play / Edit Source Code (1024 bytes in .p8.rom format:
